text: William Hamilton Dalrymple (b. 1965) is a British writer and historian.W Dalrymple, BBC Talk, March 2014, Introduction He has written a number of books, especially on the history of India, like The Age of Kali (1998), The White Mughals (2002), The Last Mughal (2006) and some others. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish historians
title: William Dalrymple
